name: restaurant_order_app
description: This app will allow users to place food orders online

scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run build-client && npm run install-server
scripts.build-project: npm run build-client && npm run install-server
scripts.start: npm run build-client && npm run install-server
scripts.build-client: cd ./client && npm install && npm run build

author: Demaria Woods - Full Stack Developer
